channel.title: Welcome and thank you! on Useless Machines! (VMMF-2017)
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome and thank you! on Useless Machines! (VMMF-2017)

item.title: Kit Contents
item.description: The first thing you should do is unpack and organize the bag of wooden parts. Notice that there is a burned side and a clean side to each part. You can choose what side you want to be the outside of the box. Now separate your parts into groups: Box Lid Motor mount Battery holder holder Hinges Now it is time to assemble these parts.
